text: The Last Fleksnes () is a 1974 Norwegian comedy movie directed by Bo Hermansson and was based on the sitcom series Fleksnes Fataliteter. It stars Rolv Wesenlund, Aud Schønemann, Finn Mehlum, Per Christensen, Britt Langlie, Kjersti Døvigen. ==Other websites== * * Category:1974 comedy movies Category:Norwegian comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Bo Hermansson
title: The Last Fleksnes
